title: Integrative Therapeutics Indolplex® | The Healthy Place
description: Integrative Therapeutics Indolplex supports healthy estrogen metabolism so you can look and feel your best.
cleaned_text: Therapeutics Indolplex supports healthy estrogen metabolism so you can look and feel your best. - Reduces a wide range of "female problems" like cramps, PMS, and hot flashes* - For women of all ages and stages of reproductive health* - Helps your body naturally protect against estrogen dominance* - Sourced from whole foods like broccoli, cauliflower, and cabbage - Patented delivery system to enhance absorption* Integrative Therapeutics Indolplex® Are you suffering from PMS, cramps, bloating, and weight gain? Experiencing hot flashes and irritability? Or maybe you are feeling off-balance? Try Integrative Therapeutics Indolplex to help you feel like you again! Indoplex supports healthy estrogen metabolism because it contains diindolylmethane (DIM).* DIM is typically found in cruciferous veggies like broccoli and cauliflower. Research shows that DIM® increases the "good" estrogens (2-hydroyestrone) while reducing the production of the "bad" estrogens (16-hydroxyestrone). Many women find relief when using Integrative Therapeutics Indolplex to support healthy estrogen levels.* - Relieves symptoms of PMS and menstrual discomfort* - Reduces hot flashes and irritability* - Supports healthy estrogen metabolism* - DIM is made of plant nutrients found in broccoli, cauliflower, cabbage, and other cruciferous veggies - DIM is active and easily absorbed — especially when combined with vitamin E and phosphatidylcholine* - Helps to protect against estrogen dominance by supporting healthy estrogen metabolism and hormonal balance* - For women of all ages and in all stages of reproductive health* - Has a patented delivery system to enhance absorption* Integrative Therapeutics provides high-quality, clinically developed products that are made with premium ingredients. High value is placed on thorough research and strict quality control manufacturing, ensuring pure and potent ingredients that allow you to enjoy your best health ever! If you are tired of putting your life on hold because of 'female problems', try Integrative Therapeutics' Indolplex and see how great you can feel! Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with food. If less support is needed, take 1 capsule daily with food or as recommended by your healthcare professional. Cautions: Keep out of reach of children. Do not use this product if pregnant, nursing, or attempting to become pregnant. A harmless but noticeable change in urine color may occur during usage of this product. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications, or have a medical condition. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 2 Capsules Servings Per Container: 30 Ingredients: Complex phosphatidylcholine, magnesium stearate Integrative Therapeutics is rooted in a rich history of integrative medicine, the role of nutrition and lifestyle in our health, and those who helped to pioneer the industry within the USA. They believe that integrative medicine is the smartest approach to restoring and maintaining health. It is this belief that prompted them to launch their company. Integrative Therapeutics is one of the top-tier manufacturers of supplements in use by physicians today, including medical, naturopathic, chiropractic, nutrition, acupuncture, and various specialties. They take pride in their evidence-based approach and meticulous processes. Much of their time and resources are focused on developing formulations that are supported by the scientific community. At The Healthy Place, we strive for accuracy in our product images and information. However, manufacturers may make changes to product packaging or ingredients that are not yet reflected on our site. We recommend that you read the labels, warnings, and directions on purchased products before use and not rely solely on the information provided by The Healthy Place. The information provided here is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult a licensed healthcare practitioner before modifying, stopping, or starting the use of any medications, health programs, diets, and/or supplements, as well as regarding any health concerns you may have.
